## 内容

-   Tidy data（整然データ）

-   tidyverse

    -   tidyr

    -   dplyr

## Tidy data（整然データ）

4条件[^1]

[^1]: <https://id.fnshr.info/2017/01/09/tidy-data-intro/>

-   個々の変数が1つの列をなす
-   個々の観測が1つの行をなす
-   個々の観測の構成単位の類型が1つの表をなす
-   個々の値が1つのセルをなす

## pivot_longer

```{r}
#| label: pivot_longer

pop_long <- world_bank_pop |>
  pivot_longer(cols = `2000`:`2017`, names_to = "year")
pop_long
```

## pivot_wider

```{r}
#| label: pivot_wider

pop_tidy <- pop_long |>
  pivot_wider(names_from = indicator)
pop_tidy
```

## dplyr

## mutate

```{r}
#| label: mutate

pop_tidy |>
  mutate(pop_non_urb = SP.POP.TOTL - SP.URB.TOTL)
```

## transmute

```{r}
#| label: transmute

pop_tidy |>
  transmute(country, year, pop_non_urb = SP.POP.TOTL - SP.URB.TOTL)
```

## filter

```{r}
#| label: filter

pop_tidy |>
  filter(year == 2017, SP.POP.TOTL >= 1e+8)
```

## select

```{r}
#| label: select

pop_tidy |>
  select(country, year, SP.POP.TOTL)
```

## arrange

```{r}
#| label: arrange

pop_tidy |>
  arrange(desc(SP.POP.TOTL))
```

## summarise

```{r}
#| label: summarise

pop_tidy |>
  group_by(country) |>
  summarise(mean_pop = mean(SP.POP.TOTL))
```
